name: Light Way (YoungUniverse)
description:
There is no more place for emotions in this world, because the source of energy that gave them to people has dried up. After that, the whole world was plunged into shadow, all people were lost in themselves. Only one, unremarkable young man, whose name is unknown to anyone, decides to go in search of this very energy. He is sure that someone or something is behind this and his decision to return the energy of light to this world becomes the meaning of his life.

Attention. The game is under development. For suggestions on how to improve the game, write in the comments. Now there are two levels available that you can pass.
